synopsis.text:
Star-studded excitement is set to sweep through the vibrant Tokyo Midi City as the highly anticipated SHOW BY ROCK!! STARS!! premieres on TOKYO MX, BSFuji, and Hokkaido Bunka Housou in 2020! The city's music scene is about to reach fever pitch as 11 sensational bands, including fan-favorites Mashumairesh!!, Plasmagica, DOKONJOFINGER, Shingan Crimsonz, REIJINGSIGNAL, Trichronika, Tsurezurenaru Ayatsuri Mugenan, Criticrista, BUDVIRGINLOGIC, ARCAREAFACT, and newcomer Yokazenohorizon, take part in the city's epic band competitions.

The stakes are higher than ever, as both established bands and fresh-faced newcomers vie for the coveted opportunity to perform atop the city's highest tower, captivating countless music fans. Amidst the glitz and glamour of Tokyo Midi City, where music and dreams of superstardom reign supreme, this all-star battle of the bands promises to showcase the toughest—and perhaps cutest—competition yet! Who among these beloved rock stars will shine the brightest and claim the ultimate musical victory? Only one way to find out: let the music play and the battles begin!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
